themes: insufficient grant funding for historic sites
loss of historic sites in Austin
key_phrases: Austin is losing its Historic sites left and right due to lack of funding
Soon it won't have a history to tell
There is only one Heritage Preservation grant and it only funds exteriors
it would be great if the scope of the funding was widened to include interiors and programming assistance
barriers_identified: lack of funding for historic sites
Heritage Preservation grant only funds exteriors
no funding for interiors or programming assistance
solutions_proposed: widen the scope of the Heritage Preservation grant to include interiors and programming assistance
